cards.title: Task 3: Implement dynamic loading for cards.
cards.description: Improve performance by loading only the cards displayed on the current screen.

cards.title: Task 4: Introduce conflict management for Git operations.
cards.description: Add logic to handle Git conflicts gracefully when multiple users edit Kanban cards or the board.

cards.title: Task 5: Add dependency and relationship management.
cards.description: Allow users to link tasks/cards to indicate dependencies and visualize them on the Kanban board.

cards.title: Task 6: Expand reporting and analytics capabilities.
cards.description: Generate real-time reports for task progress (velocity, lead time) and commit statistics.

cards.title: Task 7: Finalize sprint archiving and history browsing.
cards.description: Enable viewing and restoring historical states from Git history.

cards.title: Task 2: Update Git logic to handle the modular storage format.
cards.description:
Push and pull workflows:
Push: Serialize local JSON into board.json and card-{id}.json files.
Pull: Deserialize modular files into the local all-in-one JSON.

cards.title: Task 1: Enhance singleton to manage both local (all-in-one JSON) and Git (modular JSON) data.
cards.description:
Add methods for:
Splitting all-in-one JSON into modular files.
Reconstructing all-in-one JSON from modular files.
